app.title: Documentation Author
app.slogan: Create exciting educational content using Electra Academy.
app.description: With Documentation Author, you can easily create and share documents, worksheets, and course materials online. You can add circuits, math formulas, cloze, pictures, and more to your documents, making them more engaging and informative. Sharing your work with others has never been easier. I hope you'll give it a try!

teaser.slogan: Dive into the world of Logic Circuits for free!
teaser.description: Design your own circuits with ease, from basic gates to intricate sequential circuits, using our platform. You can plot create circuits, documentation and learning materials. Whether you're a hobbyist or an enterprise user, our platform has got you covered. It's designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, so you can focus on bringing your ideas to life. Ready to get started? Join us today and experience the power of circuit design at your fingertips!

demo.slogan: Building your very first circuit it's easy as 1..2..3
demo.description1: Design circuits quickly and easily with a modern and intuitive user interface with drag-and-drop, copy/paste, zoom and more.
demo.description2: With Electra.Academy, you can edit and run your digital circuit simulation designs online within your browser and trigger any physical device.
